HOMEPAGE.HOMESECTION1: Globally elevating behavior analytic treatment for autism and other developmental disabilities
HOMEPAGE.HOMESECTION2: Increasing quality and efficiency of treatment by increasing the effectiveness and capacity of service provides via consultation, supervision, training, and software.
HOMEPAGE.CLINICALCONTENT: Your need is matched with our expertise
HOMEPAGE.CARDCONTENT: Individualized service tailored to clinical leaders oriented towards clinical, organizational, administrative, and operational needs
HOMEPAGE.CARDCONTENT2: Supervision of aspiring behavior analysts pursuing a credential
HOMEPAGE.CARDCONTENT1: Support for clinical supervisors of treatment based on applied behavior analysis regarding all aspects of case supervision
HOMEPAGE.CARDCONTENT3: Training created and delivered based on our competence and your staff’s needs
HOMEPAGE.COURSESCONTENT: “Every month we will publish new continuing education courses and training to help refine your behavior analytic skillset.”

ABOUTUSPAGE.ABOUTUS: One in fourty-four children are diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder in the United States (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, 2021). Interventions based on the science of applied behavior analysis (ABA) are the evidence-based best-practice treatment for autism spectrum disorders. Founded in 2018, DAXTA is a growing company with the mission to globally elevate accessibility and quality of behavior analytic treatment by increasing the effectiveness and capacity of clinical service providers. We do this through our software, trainings, and by providing clinical supervision as well as consultation for ABA clinical service providers.
ABOUTUSPAGE.EXCELLENCECONTENT1: If we are going to do something, we will do it well
ABOUTUSPAGE.EXCELLENCECONTENT2: We incorporate best practices in our work
ABOUTUSPAGE.EXCELLENCECONTENT3: We strive to build systems that will promote the use of evidence-based practices by clinical providers
ABOUTUSPAGE.TEAMCENTEREDCONTENT1: Our team is our asset. At DAXTA, team members are loyal and we want them to remain loyal
ABOUTUSPAGE.TEAMCENTEREDCONTENT2: If our team members are well-equipped, qualified and happy, the customer experience will be as well
ABOUTUSPAGE.TEAMCENTEREDCONTENT3: We want to grow, and we want our team members to grow with us
ABOUTUSPAGE.OURCOREVALUECONTENT: All the work we do revolves around our core values
ABOUTUSPAGE.CUSTOMEROBSESSEDCONTENT1: We strive to provide efficient and effective customer support
ABOUTUSPAGE.CUSTOMEROBSESSEDCONTENT2: We are open to all feedback
ABOUTUSPAGE.CUSTOMEROBSESSEDCONTENT3: We are always attempting to implement feedback and requests that match our mission

OURSERVICESPAGE.OURSERVICECONTENT: DAXTA can help your company increase quality and efficiency in the treatment of autism and other developmental disabilities. At DAXTA, we provide support and guidance to service providers in areas related to system development and implementation to evaluate and increase quality of services, as well as build capacity for their staff. Our services include:
